meta.name: Kodu-inspired Dark UI Design System
meta.description: High-level, creative-director style design tokens and component guidelines to reproduce the visual language from the provided screenshots (dark, neon purple gradient, glass/neumorphic cards, large expressive typography).

spacing.rules: use spacing tokens from the scale for margins, paddings, and gaps. prefer multiples of 8 for primary layout rhythm

accessibility.motion: Respect user prefers-reduced-motion; use subtle, short animations (duration <= 300ms) for hover/focus only
accessibility.focus: always provide visible focus states: 3px solid ring using a desaturated accent or outline of white at 16%

rules: Hero sections use large vertical padding (scale[6]..scale[8]) and center-aligned content
Left-aligned headline + right visual compositional split is primary desktop layout
Cards in pricing or features use equal heights across row, stack vertically on mobile

hero_heading.usage: Large expressive headline. use italic variant for single-word emphasis, combine with sans-serif subtitle

interaction.hover: slightly raise (translateY(-2px)) and increase glow opacity

primary.usage: Primary calls to action in hero and pricing

chat_prompt.hint: Use large, airy input with drop-in send control on right. Include subtle inset glow and inner shadow to create depth

default.usage: Use for feature tiles, pricing, and content blocks. Keep content minimal and center hierarchy: title, subtitle, content.

accent.accent_edge: use a thin gradient border on hover: linear-gradient(90deg, #6f2bdc, #e75bb1) clipped to border

pricing_card.visual: center column, strong price contrast. highlighted plan uses full purple gradient background with white text and stronger glow; others are dark glass with lighter strokes

default.interaction: expand/collapse with short fade+slide. expanded area uses same glass card treatment

primary.layout: left logo, center links, right actions
primary.background: transparent over hero; switch to subtle solid on scroll
primary.link_style: uppercase small caps, letter-spaced, muted color
primary.cta: Start for Free uses primary button style

principles: Contrast-first: use a very dark canvas and bright, high-saturation accents sparingly for emphasis.
Depth through layers: combine backdrop-blur glass panels, soft inner shadows, and colored outer glows to create a sense of content floating over space.
Hierarchy by scale: headlines are dramatically oversized; supporting copy is calm and narrow to create focus.
Material consistency: every interactive surface shares the same glass + inner-shadow treatment so the system feels cohesive.
Subtle motion: micro-interactions should be short and purposeful; avoid flashy animation.

patterns.hero_split: Left: large expressive headline and subcopy. Right: illustrative orb / graphic with curly braces and soft glow. Use negative space heavily.
patterns.card_grid: 3-up cards on desktop with equal heights and a strong center accent for the featured card.
patterns.cta_cluster: Primary gradient CTA plus a secondary subtle CTA (watch demo) side-by-side in hero.
patterns.faq_list: Stacked pill accordions with consistent gap and a light focal glow on hover/expand.

recommended_techniques: Use backdrop-filter: blur() with a translucent background to reproduce frosted-glass panels.
Create gradient borders with masked backgrounds and a thin transparent border to preserve inner glow.
Simulate inner glow with inset box-shadows and a hairline outer shadow for separation.
Use :focus-visible for accessible focus outlines, not outline:none.
Compress hero typography responsively — scale down headline on smaller screens while preserving italic emphasis.

assets.illustration_orb: Prefer vector + soft radial blur; keep white glyph in center; add two mirrored brace shapes in darkened translucent stroke
assets.grain_overlay: A subtle fine-grain noise layer on top of gradients helps sell the textured purple-to-pink backdrop
